feed.title: Tauticord Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] New API and webhooks functionality
  • Ingest "Recently Added" webhooks, store in database
  • [ADDED] Display "Recently Added" count under per-library stats. See documentation for more details.

Related PRs

  • [feat] Add API + webhook ingestion by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/236

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.8.0...5.9.0

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.9.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] Migration script to auto-add new "RecentlyAdded" section to each per-library stat in config file
  • "RecentlyAdded" is also now optional, so even if migration fails, config parsing should be able to fallback to default values

Related PRs

  • [fix] Add auto-migration for RecentlyAdded config by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/237

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.9.0...5.9.1

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [FIXED] Migration script bug causing parsing errors and migrations to fail
  • Added warning logs with migration failure reasons

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.9.1...5.9.2

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] Re-introduced API and Recently Added webhooks
  • [FIXED] Moved API to separate Python process to avoid threading issues

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.9.2...5.11.0

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.12.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Tauticord now uses Discord's native timezone-aware timestamps for ETA and embed update timestamps, so times will always be displayed in the local timezone of the client.

  • ServerTimeZone and Use24HourTime no longer needed in config file. Time section still needs to be present, but can now be "empty":

    yaml ... Time: {} ... - These values will not be auto-migrated if upgrading from a legacy config, as they are no longer needed.

  • Examples of local timestamps:

Related PRs

  • Use Discord timestamps for ETA, embed updates, deprecate timezone/24-hour config options by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/238

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.11.0...5.12.0
